title: ManifestStore
description: A Container for a set of Manifests and a ValidationStatus list

active_manifest.description: A label for the active (most recent) manifest in the store

validation_status.description: ValidationStatus generated when loading the ManifestStore from an asset

Actor.description: Identifies a person responsible for an action.

credentials.description: List of references to W3C Verifiable Credentials.

identifier.description: An identifier for a human actor, used when the "type" is `humanEntry.identified`.

ClaimGeneratorInfo.description:
Description of the claim generator, or the software used in generating the claim.

This structure is also used for actions softwareAgent

icon.description: hashed URI to the icon (either embedded or remote)

name.description: A human readable string naming the claim_generator

version.description: A human readable string of the product's version

DataSource.description: A description of the source for assertion data

actors.description:
A list of [`Actor`]s associated with this source.

[`Actor`]: crate::Actor

details.description: A human-readable string giving details about the source of the assertion data.

type.description: A value from among the enumerated list indicating the source of the assertion.

HashedUri.description: Hashed Uri structure as defined by C2PA spec It is annotated to produce the correctly tagged cbor serialization

hash.description: "alg" hash of stored as cbor byte string

Ingredient.description: An `Ingredient` is any external asset that has been used in the creation of an image.

active_manifest.description:
The active manifest label (if one exists).

If this ingredient has a [`ManifestStore`], this will hold the label of the active [`Manifest`].

[`Manifest`]: crate::Manifest 
[`ManifestStore`]: crate::ManifestStore

data.description: A reference to the actual data of the ingredient.

document_id.description: Document ID from `xmpMM:DocumentID` in XMP metadata.

format.description: The format of the source file as a MIME type.

hash.description: An optional hash of the asset to prevent duplicates.

informational_URI.description: URI to an informational page about the ingredient or its data.

instance_id.description: Instance ID from `xmpMM:InstanceID` in XMP metadata.

manifest_data.description:
A [`ManifestStore`] from the source asset extracted as a binary C2PA blob.

[`ManifestStore`]: crate::ManifestStore

metadata.description:
Any additional [`Metadata`] as defined in the C2PA spec.

[`Metadata`]: crate::Metadata

relationship.description:
Set to `ParentOf` if this is the parent ingredient.

There can only be one parent ingredient in the ingredients.

thumbnail.description:
A thumbnail image capturing the visual state at the time of import.

A tuple of thumbnail MIME format (i.e. `image/jpeg`) and binary bits of the image.

title.description: A human-readable title, generally source filename.

Manifest.description: Represents all the information in a c2pa manifest.

claim_generator.description: A User Agent formatted string identifying the software/hardware/system produced this claim. Spaces are not allowed in names, versions can be specified with product/1.0 syntax

credentials.description: An array of [W3C Verifiable Credentials](https://verifiablecredentials.dev/). See also the [W3C Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/). NOTE: This area is under active development and may change.

format.description: The format of the source file as a MIME type.

instance_id.description: Instance ID from `xmpMM:InstanceID` in XMP metadata.

redactions.description: A list of redactions - URIs to a redacted assertions

title.description: A human-readable title, generally source filename.

vendor.description: Optional prefix added to the generated Manifest Label This is typically Internet domain name for the vendor (i.e. `adobe`)

ManifestAssertion.description: A labeled container for an Assertion value in a Manifest

data.description: The data of the assertion as Value

instance.description: There can be more than one assertion for any label

kind.description:
The [`ManifestAssertionKind`] for this assertion (as stored in c2pa content).

[`ManifestAssertionKind`]: crate::ManifestAssertionKind

label.description: An assertion label in reverse domain format

ManifestAssertionKind.description: Assertions in C2PA can be stored in several formats

Metadata.description: The Metadata structure can be used as part of other assertions or on its own to reference others

dateTime.description: A date time in ISO 8601 format.

ResourceRef.description: A reference to a resource to be used in JSON serialization

cert_serial_number.description: The serial number of the certificate

issuer.description: human readable issuing authority for this signature

time.description: the time the signature was created

ValidationStatus.description:
A `ValidationStatus` struct describes the validation status of a specific part of a manifest.

See <https://c2pa.org/specifications/specifications/1.0/specs/C2PA_Specification.html#_existing_manifests>.

explanation.description: Human-readable description of the validation that was performed.

url.description: Internal JUMBF reference to the entity that was validated.
